style.nav: bg-indigo-800 shadow-xl fixed w-full top-0 z-50
style.container: container mx-auto px-8 py-6 flex justify-between items-center
style.mobileMenu: absolute top-0 left-0 w-full bg-indigo-800 p-8

style.section: min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-900 to-yellow-600 text-white py-24
style.container: container mx-auto px-6 md:px-12 flex flex-col md:flex-row items-center justify-between
style.imageContainer: flex justify-center items-center relative mb-12 md:mb-0 w-full md:w-1/3
style.image: w-72 h-72 md:w-96 md:h-96 object-cover rounded-full shadow-xl transform transition-transform duration-500 hover:scale-110
style.textContainer: flex flex-col justify-center items-center md:items-start md:w-2/3 space-y-8
style.title: text-4xl md:text-5xl font-extrabold leading-tight text-white text-center md:text-left
style.subtitle: text-2xl md:text-3xl font-semibold text-yellow-400 text-center md:text-left
style.description: text-lg md:text-xl text-gray-200 max-w-xl mx-auto md:mx-0 text-center md:text-left
style.button: bg-yellow-400 text-gray-900 px-8 py-3 rounded-full text-lg font-semibold transition-colors duration-300 hover:bg-yellow-500 transform hover:scale-105
style.scrollIndicator: absolute bottom-4 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 text-gray-300 text-lg cursor-pointer hover:text-white transition-all

content.title: Hello, I'm Jordan
content.subtitle: I'm a
content.description: I am passionate about building user-friendly and performant web applications. My focus is to create modern, responsive designs that offer a seamless user experience. I love pushing the boundaries of web technologies and solving challenges with creative solutions.
